From: Jill Shellow  
To: ' (USANYS)"  
Cc: Andrew Patel <I  (USANYS)" 
< 
Subject: Re: Johnny Contreras -  Investigation of 
Jeffrey 
Epstein Death 
Date: Wed, 21 Aug 2019 21:16:41 +0000 
I am traveling today. Andy and I will get back to you by phone tomorrow sometime in the afternoon. Thanks, 
J-
Jill R. 
Shellow, Esq. 
Law Offices of Jill Shellow 
80 Broad Street, Suite 1900 
New York, NY 10004 
Please 
excuse all typos and auto correct 
On Aug 21, 2019, at 3:35 PM, 
(USANYS) < 
> 
wrote: 
Hi Andy/Jill, 
We understand that Mr. Contreras is willing to meet with us in a proffer session, and that the proffer would be limited 
only to the information he has regarding Mr. Epstein's death. If so, when would be convenient to meet? Let us know if 
you'd like to discuss anything by phone. Thanks. 
From: Andrew Patel < 
Sent: Wednesday, August 21, 2019 4:20 PM 
To: (USANYE)>; (USANYE).> 
(USANYE) 
< 
Cc: 'Donald 
Yannella 
;'Jill 
Shellow' 
(USANYS) 
Subject: RE: Johnny Contreras — Investigation of Jeffrey Epstein Death 
Many thanks. Talk to you soon. 
Andy 
Andrew G. Patel 
Attorney at Law 
80 Broad Street, Suite 1900 
New York, NY 10004 
Tel: 
(USANYS) <MI> 
EFTA00018959

CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: This e-mail message is covered by the Electronic Communications Privacy Act,

e-mail, and delete all copies of 
the message 
from your computer. Thank you. 
From: (USANYE) [mailto:
Sent: Wednesday, A ust 21 2019 4:16 PM 
To: Andrew Patel; USANYE (USANYE) 
Cc: Donald Yannella ; Shellow'; (USANYS); (USANYS) 
Subject: RE: Johnny Contreras — Investigation of Jeffrey Epstein Death 
Hi Andy: 
I've spoken with my wonderful former colleagues in SDNY who are handling the investigation, and who are cc'd here. I 
passed along the information you and Jill provided to us yesterday, and they will reach out to you directly to set up a 
proffer on this topic. 
Thanks, and best, 
From: Andrew Patel 
Sent: Monday, August 12, 2019 3:15 PM 
To: (USANYE) 
(USANYE) <> 
Cc: Donald Yannella
Andrew Patel 
Subject: Johnny Contreras — Investigation of Jeffrey Epstein Death 
(USANYE) 
<->; 
Dear
nd 
'Jill 
Shellow' < 
This email concerns the investigation into the death of Jeffrey Epstein in 
the MCC. We realize that it is unlikely your office 
is involved, but we 
thought that we should inform the government of the following so you can 
take whatever action you believe is appropriate. 
Jhonny Contreras was 
recently returned to the SHU in the MCC. At the 
time of Mr. Epstein's death, it is my understanding that Mr. Contreras was 
housed in a 
cell on the same tier and across the hall from Mr. Epstein's 
cell. Mr. Contreras did not see Mr. Epstein hang himself, but he would be 
EFTA00018960

willing to speak to investigators, in the 
presence of counsel, about his 
observations. 
Please 
let us know if there is anything further we should do to follow-up. 
Andy 
Andrew G. Patel 
Attorney at Law 
80 Broad Street, Suite 1900 
New 
York, NY 10004 
Tel: 
Fax: 
CONFIDENTIALITY 
NOTICE:

message is covered by the Electronic

in error, please notify me immediately by telephone at (212) 349-0230 and by return e-mail, 
and delete all copies of 
the 
message from your computer. Thank you. 
EFTA00018961
